cs.NA, cs.SC, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with the adaptive construction of polynomial chaos expansions (PCE) using basis selection, which is a numerical analysis technique commonly used in computational science and engineering (cs.NA). The paper also discusses the use of gradient information, which is a common feature in optimization and machine learning (cs.SC, cs.LG, cs.AI). Finally, the paper presents numerical examples that demonstrate the accuracy and effectiveness of the proposed method, which is a common theme in control systems and optimization (cs.SY).
